snippet: A group of four Islamic militants, all of them British citizens, admitted on Wednesday to a conspiracy to place a bomb in the toilets of the London Stock Exchange.
abstract: Four Islamic militants, all British citizens, admit involvement in conspiracy inspired by Al Qaeda to place a bomb in the toilets of the London Stock Exchange, with the hope that the multistory building would catch fire.

byline.original: By JOHN F. BURNS and ALAN COWELL

lead_paragraph: A group of four Islamic militants, all of them British citizens, admitted on Wednesday to a conspiracy to place a bomb in the toilets of the London Stock Exchange.

headline.seo: Militants Admit Plan to Bomb London Stock Exchange
headline.main: Militants Plead Guilty in Plan to Bomb London Stock Exchange
headline.print_headline: Militants Plead Guilty in Plan to Bomb London Stock Exchange
